title.rendered: Alvarium Advises on Middle East Sustainable Food Hub

excerpt.rendered: Eat Just, Inc., a company that applies cutting-edge science and technology to create healthier, more sustainable foods, announced today that it has partnered with Doha Venture Capital (DVC) and Qatar Free Zones Authority (QFZA), to build the first-ever cultivated meat facility in the Middle East and Northern Africa (MENA) region.  Alvarium advised on the transaction.
